description: The Syncfusion Dashboard Platform is an end-to-end solution for creating, managing, and sharing interactive business dashboards. It includes a powerful dashboard designer application for easily composing dashboards as well as a web interface for managing and sharing dashboards. Receive email notifications when specific values reach a threshold. Create personalized home pages by pinning widgets from across multiple dashboards. This greatly simplifies keeping track of important metrics from different dashboards. Organize related dashboards as one file and showcase them in tabbed manner collectively in one page. Add your own HTML5 and JavaScript based widgets into dashboard in few steps.
summary: Syncfusion Dashboard Server lets you efficiently organize and share Dashboards through a web interface
